sources.title: Condemned (1929)
sources.description: I've been researching newly public domain films from 1929 and earlier, so I'm uploading the best possible copies that I can find. A film that likely would have annoyed censors at the time, Condemned follows a thief at a penal colony who manages to attract romantic attention from the warden's wife. While reviews for the picture were solid, the box office was mediocre, and the film was soon forgotten as anything but a solid role for Oscar nominee Ronald Colman.Â

metadata.Plot: Suave thief Colman is sent to Devil's Island, where he becomes romantically involved with the wife of sadistic warden Digges.
metadata.Actors: Ronald Colman, Ann Harding, Louis Wolheim
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 3 wins & 1 nomination total
